Title: Relates to establishing a rebuttable presumption in certain crimes against an elderly, incompetent or incapacitated person
Summary: Establishes a rebuttable presumption that certain transfers of money or property by an elderly, incompetent or incapacitated person were a wrongful taking in violation larceny statutes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing a rebuttable presumption in certain crimes against an elderly, incompetent or incapacitated person
